text: the world have the problem with plastic
here in Norway we think we have the
solution
most places an empty bottle like this to
just be thrown in the bin or maybe even
chucked on the street but not here in
Norway I've come back inside the shop
and this machine is going to reward safe
for bringing a bottle back so when we
buy a bottle of soda or something we pay
one pruner extra and when we put it in
the machine we get that's money back
again and it's released because your
recycle is good for environments a
bottle can be recycled more at one time
it can actually be a recycle 12 times we
separate the clear bottle from the color
bottle the clear can be used to new
bottles the colour bottle can be used a
new plastic material if soft drink
producer join our system they pay less
taxes everyone wins
[Applause]
